reviews.review: AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!! This movie (if u even wanna call it that) is an absolute disgrace!!! ZERO EFFORT was involved in making this movie!!! Even the animation isnt that great!!! IT IS A CASH GRAB AND THAT IS ALL!! A means to advertise APPS to us!!
Absolutely boring. Pretty much Wreck-it Ralph but 10x worse. Best quote from the movie- "Words aren't cool." <-- (Actual quote. Congrats, Sony)
What a bland way just to get your kids to see a movie about phone emotions. The plot is really horrible, the voice acting is the only thing I kind of liked, which led to a HALF STAR review.
This movie is really awesome and eye-opening. Everyone should watch it and we don't care that it is at six percent right now. We are going to stop this. Let's bring it up to above average. Alex Green

The emoji movie, it was actually pretty good despite what other people have said. the plot was amazing, gene (meh emoji) could express more than one emotion, and in this world people can only have one, and thus he is labled as a "malfunction". People say this is bad because "oh they ripped of another movie" or "oh its a desperate attempt to appeal to a younger audience". The reason I gave it 4.5 stars because, in the phone when someone is using an emoji, that emoji has to make a facial expression. but the best part of it was the message, but people don't see it because they're to busy criticizing it. The message really imposes good morals on our youth. People from the 90s knew about cartoons that impose good morals, and they know that nowadays, we don't have that anymore. The movie really teaches acceptance, in other words, the movie teaches, people are different, and differences make us who we are. You might be saying "the emojis are different"  they are different on the outside, but deep in their roots, they're all the same. I don't know if the people who made this movie to have it have this message, but... does it matter anyways?

the emoji movie is a generic uninspired "film"  packed with predictable and uninspired jokes. You can also expect an unhealthy dosage of terrible social commentary in this action packed meme.

8/10, not enough poop jokes
The death of all good things.
